SELECT eva.id, eva.score, eva.content, eva.create_date AS createDate, oi.code, oi.price, oi.day_num AS dayNum, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar, rt.name, hi.name AS hotelName FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = eva.order_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = eva.user_id ) LEFT JOIN room_type rt ON ( rt.id = oi.type_id ) LEFT JOIN hotel_info hi ON ( hi.id = oi.hotel_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND eva.type = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{evaluation.userId}
AND hi.user_id = #{evaluation.hotelId}
AND hi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.hotelName},'%')
AND rt.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.roomName},'%')
ORDER BY eva.create_date DESC

SELECT eva.id, eva.score, eva.content, eva.create_date AS createDate, oi.code, oi.price, oi.amount, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar, si.scenic_name AS scenicName FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN scenic_order oi ON (oi.id = eva.order_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN scenic_info si ON ( si.id = oi.scenic_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND eva.type = 2
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{evaluation.userId}
AND si.scenic_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.hotelName},'%')
ORDER BY eva.create_date DESC

SELECT eva.content, eva.create_date, eva.score, ui.avatar, ui.name FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.id = eva.order_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = eva.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND eva.type = 2 AND oi.hotel_id = #{hotelId}
